import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./ItemQuestion.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import moment from "moment"; function ItemQuestion({ question: { id, title, slug, category_question, tags, user, comments_couter, votes_couter, views_couter, created_at, }, }) { use return ( <>
{votes_couter}

votes

{comments_couter}

answers

{views_couter}

views

{title}

{tags.name}

{category_question.name} {user.username} asked {moment(created_at).fromNow(true)} ago
); } export default ItemQuestion;
